meanings.definition: Stop feeling angry or resentful towards someone for an offense, flaw, or mistake.
meanings.sent1: I forgave my friend for breaking my toy.
meanings.sent2: It is important to forgive others to have peace of mind.
meanings.sent3: I forgive you for eating the last cookie, but next time, ask first!
meanings.sent4: Forgiving is like releasing a heavy burden from your heart.
meanings.sent5: She found it hard to forgive herself for the mistake she made.

meanings.sent1: The kind man decided to forgive the debt owed to him.
meanings.sent2: The bank agreed to forgive a portion of the loan.
meanings.sent3: I forgive you of your debt, but remember to pay it back next time.
meanings.sent4: Forgiving a debt is like giving a second chance to start anew.
meanings.sent5: The act of forgiving a debt can bring relief to both parties involved.
